Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $1,350,000, which we believe strikes a fair balance between its worth and your budget. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
